title: Cap Streamers, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Mechlin style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap streamers of Mechlin lace in a design showing repeated floral spray set within oval medallions, connected by a symmetric swirling and crossing leaf pattern, forming additional medallions containing centrally placed quatrefoil shapes. Fond: maille à cinq trous. Modes: fond de neige.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Streamers, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Mechlin style. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-53-a,b.
